pages.text: The people around you have already helped you in one or the other dicey situation. It's time to give something back. A pinch of [Shimmerstone](book://resources/shimmerstone) allows the package to explode in a colorful shower of particles.\Click the Present onto the items you want to gift, wrap it in a [#](bb00bb)Crafting Table[#](), then all you have to do is place it down for the recipient to open it and watch them jump in joy.

pages.text: _(Or, you know, you can always gift your future self!)_
